plot outline: A Newly Married Couple Going For Honeymoon To Goa By Road While Travelling Through Highway Ai Night They Get In Trap Of Woman Ghost Who Has Been Murdered On That Road. The Ghost Kidnaps The Bride Asks Groom To Get The Person Who Killed Her. Who Is That Girl? Who Killed Her? Why Was She Killed? Can Groom Get That Man? What Happens To Bride? All This Answer in Full Movie.
title: Goa 350 KM
plot: A Newly Married Couple Going For Honeymoon To Goa By Road While Travelling Through Highway Ai Night They Get In Trap Of Woman Ghost Who Has Been Murdered On That Road. The Ghost Kidnaps The Bride Asks Groom To Get The Person Who Killed Her. Who Is That Girl? Who Killed Her? Why Was She Killed? Can Groom Get That Man? What Happens To Bride? All This Answer in Full Movie.

Ameya and Vaidehi were college sweethearts but broke up due to misunderstandings five years on Ameya still can't forget it and wants to marry her.Ameya and Vaidehi get married and leave for honeymoon to Goa while the destination is 350 Km away their car breaks down frequently showing the same Km whenever it breaks.Vaidehi is then captured by spirit of Meena who tells Ameya a car number en route to Goa and that he should get the person travelling in it to her before sunrise if he wants to see Vaidehi alive.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
